    def __init__(self, name, origin, nutritional_value, taste, season, source):
        self.name = name
        self.origin = origin
        self.nutritional_value = nutritional_value
        self.taste = taste
        self.season = season
        self.source = source
rare_fruits_list = [Fruit('Durian', 'Southeast Asia', 'High in Fiber', 'Sweet and Creamy', 'June-October', 'Thailand'), Fruit('Rambutan', 'Malaysia', 'Rich in Vit C', 'Sweet and Sour', 'June-September', 'Malaysia')]

def get_optimal_fruits(season, dietary_restrictions, allergies):
    optimal_fruits = [fruit for fruit in rare_fruits_list if fruit.season == season and fruit.name not in dietary_restrictions and (fruit.name not in allergies)]
    if len(optimal_fruits) < 10:
        return 'Sorry, not enough rare fruits are available that meet your requirements.'
    return optimal_fruits[:9]

mutants.mutated_line: return optimal_fruits[:0]
